multanimitti.name: Multani Mitti
multanimitti.description: A mineral-rich clay used for skincare and haircare, known for its oil-absorbing and detoxifying properties.
multanimitti.keywords: skin care, authentic, non preservative, natural, chemical free

benefits.hair: Cleanses scalp, reduces dandruff, removes excess oil.
benefits.skin: Controls acne, brightens complexion, removes impurities.
benefits.health: Used in body wraps to detoxify and improve blood circulation.

howToUse.hair: Mix with water or aloe vera, apply to scalp, leave for 20 min, and rinse.
howToUse.skin: Mix with rose water or milk, apply as a face mask, leave for 15 min, then rinse.
howToUse.health: Can be used in clay wraps for detoxification.

multanimitti.timePeriod: Use twice a week for 30 mins on skin | 5 - 30 mins on hair
notes: Avoid using on very dry skin.
Use once or twice a week for best results.

amlapowder.name: Amla powder
amlapowder.description: A nutrient-rich fruit known for its high vitamin C content and rejuvenating properties.

benefits.hair: Strengthens hair roots, reduces dandruff, prevents premature greying.
benefits.skin: Brightens complexion, boosts collagen production, fights pigmentation.
benefits.health: Enhances immunity, aids digestion, and promotes overall well-being.

howToUse.hair: Mix amla powder with water or coconut oil, apply to scalp and hair.
howToUse.skin: Use amla juice as a toner or mix powder in face masks.
howToUse.health: Consume raw, as juice, or in powder form with warm water.

amlapowder.timePeriod: Use twice a week for 30 mins on skin | 5 - 30 mins on hair
notes: Avoid excessive consumption as it may cause acidity.

indigopowder.name: Indigo powder
indigopowder.description: A natural dye used for hair coloring and strengthening.

benefits.hair: Provides natural black/blue dye, promotes hair growth, reduces scalp infections.
benefits.skin: Used in herbal medicine for its anti-inflammatory properties.
benefits.health: Traditionally used for wound healing and skin conditions.

howToUse.hair: Mix with henna for natural black hair dye.
howToUse.skin: Used in medicinal formulations for treating skin disorders.
howToUse.health: Can be used externally for its healing properties.

notes: Patch test before applying to hair to check for allergies.

neempowder.name: Neem powder
neempowder.description: A powerful antibacterial and antifungal herb used for skin, hair, and health.

benefits.hair: Treats dandruff, strengthens roots, prevents lice.
benefits.skin: Clears acne, reduces pigmentation, fights bacterial infections.
benefits.health: Boosts immunity, purifies blood, aids digestion.

howToUse.hair: Use neem oil or neem powder paste for scalp health.
howToUse.skin: Apply neem paste or neem water as a toner.
howToUse.health: Drink neem tea or use in herbal formulations.

notes: Neem oil is very strong, dilute before use.

shikakaipowder.name: Shikakai powder
shikakaipowder.description: A natural hair cleanser known for strengthening and conditioning hair.

benefits.hair: Gently cleanses, strengthens roots, promotes hair growth.
benefits.skin: Used in herbal scrubs for exfoliation.
benefits.health: Traditionally used for treating skin infections.

howToUse.hair: Make a paste with water, apply as a shampoo.
howToUse.skin: Use in face masks for cleansing.
howToUse.health: Can be used in Ayurvedic remedies.

suitableFor: Individuals with weak or damaged hair
notes: Avoid contact with eyes as it can cause irritation.

hennapowder.name: Henna
hennapowder.description: A natural dye used for hair and skin conditioning.

benefits.hair: Conditions hair, strengthens roots, adds shine.
benefits.skin: Used for body art and cooling effects.

howToUse.hair: Mix with water and apply as a hair mask.
howToUse.skin: Apply paste for temporary tattoos or cooling effects.
howToUse.health: Used in traditional medicine for wound healing.

suitableFor: Those looking for temporary body art
notes: Test on a small area before use to check for allergies.

bhringraj.name: Bhringraj
bhringraj.description: A medicinal herb known for hair nourishment and scalp health.

benefits.hair: Promotes hair growth, prevents greying, reduces dandruff.
benefits.skin: Soothes inflammation and supports skin regeneration.

howToUse.hair: Use as oil or paste for scalp massage.
howToUse.skin: Use in herbal pastes for skin healing.

suitableFor: Individuals with hair loss or thinning
Those with liver or digestive concerns
notes: Perform a patch test before use.

reetha.name: Reetha
reetha.description: A natural soap with excellent cleansing properties.

benefits.hair: Cleanses scalp, adds shine, removes excess oil.
benefits.health: Used as an eco-friendly soap alternative.

howToUse.hair: Boil and use liquid as a shampoo.
howToUse.skin: Use as a natural face wash.

suitableFor: Individuals with oily hair or scalp
notes: Avoid contact with eyes as it can be irritating.
